participant_1.background:
I help people in the hospital during the week and pretend to be a medieval knight in the forest on the weekends.
I don't let my busy schedule get in the way of my relationships with others.
mom in telecommunications.
I stay away from clowns and eat my favorite blue jello.
my best friend is from tanzania.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.
I enjoy making things for my family.
I find it important that my partner is trustworthy and supportive.
my car is pink.
I love to act out my characters with my friends.

content.text: Hello there, I am a knight during the week and a nurse during the weekend.
That sounds very interesting! What inspired you to become a knight?
I have always been interested in medieval history and I enjoy the physical activity and the sense of community that comes with being a part of a medieval reenactment group.
That's great! I am glad that you have found a way to combine your interests and make a difference in the world.
Thank you! I am also glad that I get to make time for my family and friends.
That's important! What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, reading, and swimming.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests! What do you like about swimming?
I love the feeling of being in the water and the challenge of improving my technique.
That's great! I love swimming too. I find it to be a very relaxing and enjoyable way to exercise.
I agree! It's a great way to relieve stress.
It is! Do you have any favorite swimming spots?
I love swimming at the lake near my house
